title: Amazon Shares Dive 8% After Announcing $200 Billion AI Spending Spree
description: Amazon revealed plans Thursday to invest $200 billion in 2026 on data centers, satellites, and infrastructure as part of its aggressive push into artificial intelligence, surpassing Wall Street projections by $50 billion. Shares dropped almost eight percent in Friday morning trading.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Market Volatility Shakes Global Economies Amid AI Concerns
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Big Tech to Spend $650 Billion This Year as AI Race Intensifies
description: Four of the biggest US technology companies together have forecast capital expenditures that will reach about $650 billion in 2026 — a mind-boggling tide of cash earmarked for new data centers and the long list of equipment needed to make them tick, including artificial intelligence chips, networking cables and backup generators.

title: People being scammed on a daily basis as AI videos, images getting more convincing
